creator: jd@cpanel.net
text:
ssl_util_ssl.c: In function `SSL_X509_isSGC':
ssl_util_ssl.c:297: `EXTENDED_KEY_USAGE' undeclared (first use in this function)


EXTENDED_KEY_USAGE was added in OpenSSL 0.9.7

HAVE_SSL_X509V3_EXT_d2i is defined for all versions of OpenSSL

creator: sf@sfritsch.de
text: 0.9.6 is ancient. I don't see a reason to support that anymore.
